data.title: 8-78 Soap Opera Digest HAL LINDEN-DEIDRE HALL
data.meta_description: August 1978 Soap Opera Digest - Hal Linden-Deidre Hall
data.text:
SOAP OPERA DIGEST

August 1978

Soap Opera Digest Visits The Greatest Show On Earth

Full-Page Article followed by 4-pages of candid color photos of soap stars at the Ringling Brothers and Barnum & Bailey Circus, featuring

Veleka Gray...Amy Gibson...Curt Dawson...John James...Philip MacHale

Interview with Ed Bryce of Guiding Light

2-pages; candid inset photo

Veleka Advises, 2-pages of fan letters and answered by star Veleka Gray

Candid inset photo

Personality Portraits: Don Stewart of Guiding Light

5-pages; two candid photos & a Full-Page Drawing of Stewart

Bonus Full-Page Color Photo of Stephen Yates & Janet Grey

Cover Story: My Two Days On A Soap Opera by Hal Linden

5-pages; 2 candid photos and The Cover Shot

Ryan's Hope Mystery Man From Ireland: Tom MacGreevy

4-pages; 3 candid photos

Seen At The Emmys

Full-Page Article with two candid photos featuring

Jaime Lyn Bauer and Matthew Cowles & Kathleen Dezina

Candice Debuts

Pictorial featuring AMC star Candice Earley who made her concert debut with her new group, Pure Energy - article & 6 candid photos performing onstage

Synopses Section, multiple pages for each soap with candid photos featuring

Peter White...Robin Strasser...Jay Morran...Christina Pickles...Dennis Cooney...Barbara Rucker...Wesley Eure & Suzanne Zenore...Mary Frann & Suzanne Rogers...Meg Mundy...Dorothy Fielding & Philip English...Kiel Martin...Denny Albee...Richard Backus...Robert Burton...Peter Hansen...Richard Dean Anderson...Michael Zaslow...Stephen Yates...Sherry Rooney & Richard K. Weber...Michael Kennedy...Claire Malis...Philip MacHale...Justin Deas...Jose Aleman...Sherry Mathis...Brenda Dickson...Tom Ligon

The Winning-est Soap - All My Children

Article and six pages of candid photos backstage at the game show, Family Feud, featuring

Nancy Addison...Erika Slezak...Bernard Barrow...Michael Levin...Francesca James...Richard Dawson...Ruth Warrick...Helen Gallagher...Kathleen Noone...John Gabriel...Richard Van Vleet...Hugh Franklin

Deidre Hall's Fight To Save The Seals

7-page interview; 2 candid photos

Interview with Stephen Joyce of For Richer, For Poorer

4-pages; 3 candid photos

Soaps And The Issues: The Battered Wife

3-page article; no photos

Interview with Paula Trueman of All My Children

5-pages; 3 candid photos

Days With The Hayes

6-pages authored by Days Of Our Lives' co-stars Bill Hayes & Susan Seaforth Hayes

Multiple photos, including a Full-Page Color Shot of the pair with

co-star Denise Alexander
